content: grab a bunch of leftover yarn ends and make an easy crochet granny square bookmark you ll also have the chance to practice invisible seaming a fantastic technique for joining crochet squares this is a beginner-friendly crochet pattern this granny bookmark is 4 5 cm 1 8 in wide and 18 cm 7 in long each granny square is roughly 3 x 3 cm 1 2 x 1 2 inches you can change the length of the bookmark by adding more squares **now available on crochetpedia ** https //crochetpedia com/granny-square-bookmark-free-crochet-pattern/ written pattern and video tutorials available on crochetpedia com
